metadata.title: CVE-2016-0810 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: media/libmedia/SoundPool.cpp in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4,5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 mishandles lockingrequirements, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystemaccess, aka internal bug 25781119.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
